verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>. We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H5608>told<s%> us, what <S%H6467>work<s%> thou <S%H6466>didst<s%> in their <S%H3117>days<s%>, in the <S%H3117>times<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>.

How thou didst drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> with thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5193>plantedst<s%> them; how thou didst <S%H7489>afflict<s%> the <S%H3816>people<s%>, and cast them <S%H7971>out<s%>.

For they <S%H3423>got<s%> not the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%> by their own <S%H2719>sword<s%>, neither did their own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> them: but thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and thine <S%H2220>arm<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, because thou hadst a <S%H7521>favour<s%> unto them.
Thou art my <S%H4428>King<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H3444>deliverances<s%> for <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Through thee will we push <S%H5055>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies<s%>: through thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will we tread them <S%H947>under<s%> that rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against us.
For I will not <S%H982>trust<s%> in my <S%H7198>bow<s%>, neither shall my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> me.
But thou hast <S%H3467>saved<s%> us from our <S%H6862>enemies<s%>, and hast put them to <S%H954>shame<s%> that <S%H8130>hated<s%> us.
In <S%H430>God<s%> we <S%H1984>boast<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long, and <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H637>But<s%> thou hast cast <S%H2186>off<s%>, and put us to <S%H3637>shame<s%>; and goest not <S%H3318>forth<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies<s%>.
Thou makest us to <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> from the <S%H6862>enemy<s%>: and they which <S%H8130>hate<s%> us <S%H8154>spoil<s%> for themselves.
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> us like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> appointed for <S%H3978>meat<s%>; and hast <S%H2219>scattered<s%> us among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.
Thou <S%H4376>sellest<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H1952>nought<s%>, and dost not <S%H7235>increase<s%> thy wealth by their <S%H4242>price<s%>.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, a <S%H3933>scorn<s%> and a <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> us.
Thou <S%H7760>makest<s%> us a <S%H4912>byword<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, a <S%H4493>shaking<s%> of the <S%H7218>head<s%> among the <S%H3816>people<s%>.
My <S%H3639>confusion<s%> is <S%H3117>continually<s%> before me, and the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of my <S%H6440>face<s%> hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> me,
For the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> and <S%H1442>blasphemeth<s%>; by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and <S%H5358>avenger<s%>.
All this is <S%H935>come<s%> upon us; yet have we not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> thee, neither have we dealt <S%H8266>falsely<s%> in thy <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
Our <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, neither have our <S%H838>steps<s%> <S%H5186>declined<s%> from thy <S%H734>way<s%>;
Though thou hast sore <S%H1794>broken<s%> us in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> us with the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>.
If we have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, or stretched <S%H6566>out<s%> our <S%H3709>hands<s%> to a <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%>;
Shall not <S%H430>God<s%> search this <S%H2713>out<s%>? for he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H8587>secrets<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Yea, for thy sake are we <S%H2026>killed<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> long; we are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> for the <S%H2878>slaughter<s%>.
<S%H5782>Awake<s%>, why <S%H3462>sleepest<s%> thou, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>? <S%H6974>arise<s%>, cast us not <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>.
Wherefore <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H7911>forgettest<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression<s%>?
For our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H7743>down<s%> to the <S%H6083>dust<s%>: our <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%> for our <S%H5833>help<s%>, and <S%H6299>redeem<s%> us for thy <S%H2617>mercies'<s%> sake.
